context: Comprehensive deep scan identified 23 incomplete implementation items across code, tests, and tooling. Items categorized and prioritized per AGENTS.md protocol.

issues.title: PII encryption not implemented for Employee model
issues.description: Employee model comment indicates PII encryption is not implemented. PDPL/GDPR compliance risk. Sensitive employee data may be stored unencrypted.
issues.action: Implement field-level encryption for PII fields (nationalId, phone, email, address) using AES-256-GCM with key rotation
issues.definitionOfDone: All Employee PII fields encrypted at rest; decryption only on authorized access

issues.title: SADAD/SPAN live payout mode not implemented (production fallback to manual)
issues.evidenceSnippet: [PayoutProcessor] SADAD/SPAN live mode requested but not implemented. Staying in manual fallback.
issues.description: Live payout mode logs as not implemented. Production payouts remain in manual fallback mode. Blocks automated seller payouts via SADAD/SPAN network.
issues.action: Implement SADAD/SPAN API integration with proper authentication, transaction handling, and reconciliation
issues.definitionOfDone: Automated payouts working in production with SADAD_SPAN_MODE=live; manual fallback removed

issues.title: Recurring billing charge endpoint not implemented
issues.description: Recurring billing charge API returns NOT_IMPLEMENTED. Revenue workflow incomplete for subscription-based billing.
issues.action: Implement recurring charge logic with payment gateway integration, retry handling, and invoice generation
issues.definitionOfDone: Recurring charges process automatically; invoices generated; failures retry per policy

issues.title: GraphQL work-order mutations return NOT_IMPLEMENTED (4 mutations)
issues.description: Four GraphQL mutations (updateWorkOrder, deleteWorkOrder, assignWorkOrder, completeWorkOrder) return NOT_IMPLEMENTED. Mobile app work-order management blocked.
issues.action: Implement all 4 mutations with proper authorization, validation, and MongoDB operations
issues.definitionOfDone: All 4 mutations working; mobile app can manage work orders via GraphQL

issues.title: Support welcome email route returns 501 (2 locations)
issues.description: Support welcome email route returns 501 Not Implemented at two code paths. New user onboarding emails not sent.
issues.action: Implement email sending logic using existing email service infrastructure
issues.definitionOfDone: Welcome emails sent successfully; delivery tracking logged

issues.title: Owner statements export endpoint not implemented
issues.description: Owner statements route returns 501 for export functionality. Property owners cannot export financial statements.
issues.action: Implement PDF/XLSX export using existing export-worker infrastructure
issues.definitionOfDone: Owners can download statements in PDF and XLSX formats

issues.title: XLSX export worker using placeholder implementation
issues.evidenceSnippet: * TODO: Implement proper XLSX export using exceljs/sheetjs when needed.
issues.description: Export worker has TODO for proper XLSX implementation. Currently may use basic CSV fallback.
issues.action: Implement XLSX export using exceljs library with proper formatting and styling
issues.definitionOfDone: XLSX exports generate proper Excel files with headers, formatting, and data validation

issues.title: Notifications stream lacks pub/sub scaling for horizontal deployment
issues.evidenceSnippet: // TODO: Publish to a shared pub/sub channel for horizontal scaling
issues.description: SSE notifications stream TODO indicates missing shared pub/sub for horizontal scaling. Multi-instance deployments may miss notifications.
issues.action: Implement Redis pub/sub or similar for cross-instance notification broadcasting
issues.definitionOfDone: Notifications reach all connected clients regardless of which instance they're connected to

issues.title: AI building model generation TODO placeholder
issues.evidenceSnippet: // TODO: Implement AI-powered generation using LLM
issues.description: Building model generation uses TODO placeholder for AI-powered generation. Future enhancement for automated building modeling.
issues.action: Implement LLM-based building model generation when AI feature set is prioritized
issues.definitionOfDone: AI can generate building models from floor plans or descriptions
issues.deferReason: P3 future enhancement; not blocking current functionality

issues.title: Vitest multi-project migration TODO
issues.evidenceSnippet: // TODO: migrate to a multi-project structure when environmentMatchGlobs is removed from Vitest.
issues.description: Vitest config includes TODO for multi-project migration once environmentMatchGlobs is removed from Vitest.
issues.action: Migrate to multi-project structure when Vitest deprecates environmentMatchGlobs
issues.definitionOfDone: Test configuration uses multi-project structure per Vitest best practices
issues.deferReason: Dependent on Vitest upstream changes; monitor for deprecation

issues.title: S3 cleanup testability requires route refactor
issues.evidenceSnippet: // TODO: Refactor route to make S3 cleanup testable via dependency injection
issues.description: Test notes route refactor needed to make S3 cleanup testable via dependency injection.
issues.action: Refactor work-orders PATCH route to accept S3 client via DI for testability
issues.definitionOfDone: S3 cleanup logic testable without hitting real AWS
issues.deferReason: Test infrastructure improvement; not blocking feature delivery

issues.title: FilterPresetsDropdown tests not implemented (2 test files)
issues.evidenceSnippet: // FilterPresetsDropdown not implemented - tracked in SSOT for future implementation
issues.description: FilterPresetsDropdown component tests not implemented in marketplace and aqar test suites.
issues.action: Implement FilterPresetsDropdown tests when component is built
issues.deferReason: Component not yet implemented; tracked for future

issues.title: Pricebooks POST sanitization test marked as todo
issues.evidenceSnippet: // This test is marked as todo until POST route implements field sanitization (tracked separately)
issues.description: Test for pricebooks POST field sanitization marked as todo until route implements sanitization.
issues.action: Implement test after POST route sanitization is added
issues.definitionOfDone: Sanitization test passes after route implementation

issues.title: E2E finance-billing flow tolerates 404/NOT_IMPLEMENTED
issues.description: E2E test accepts 404 or NOT_IMPLEMENTED responses. Test may pass even when route is broken.
issues.action: Tighten E2E test to fail on 404/501 once all billing routes are implemented
issues.definitionOfDone: E2E test requires 200 response; fails on incomplete routes

testInfrastructure.note: The following are INTENTIONAL test helper utilities, NOT bugs

items.description: Test helper to gracefully skip tests for routes not yet implemented. Proper test infrastructure.
items.action: No action needed - this is correct test helper behavior

items.description: Test helper for explicitly testing 501 responses. Used for feature-flagged routes.
items.action: No action needed - this is correct test helper behavior

verification.gitStatus: 7 commits ahead of origin/main on agent/AGENT-0008/type-safety-fixes

criticalItems: SEC-PII-001: PII encryption not implemented (PDPL/GDPR risk)
BUG-PAYOUT-001: SADAD/SPAN live mode not implemented (production payouts blocked)
